#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;


int main(){
    long long int sq,t,l;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%lld",&l);
        sq = -2 + (long long int)sqrt((double)(l+9));
        if(sq == 1)
            printf("-1\n");
        else
            printf("%lld\n",sq);
    }
    return 0;
}
